A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
YUK!
Very Disappointing plot\, Missed opportunities between Luke's new understanding of the Force and him teaching Rey....Really liked the Yoda cameo!
Some major plot hook miscues (Space Chase being first and foremost\, and Lea's Force? Child please!)\, And more of the little guy rising up would have been great but completely missed.
The Villains are too...Disney for my liking\, Snoke's assessment of Ben "as A spoiled boy in a mask" is spot on! Great line and interaction.

But what really does this move injustice is the tired old tropes from movies past\, just remaking old scenes with better special effects is a negative in my mind. 

Interesting the ROTTEN TOMAOTOE website won't accept this rating (1.5 stars\, simply for the Yoda scene) of the movie? Some dark side behind the scenes buyouts happening?
